body: So I don't know if I'm happy or sad or interested the I have ADHD we just found out a few days ago that I have it and I'm curious to see how many people have it here (Only tell me/us if you are okay with it) and tell me your experiences and privileges you get because I know some people get extra things if they have the disorder. (Mine are getting discussed I believe). So yeah only tell us if you want to and yeah bye. This post is not meant to be a personal post or make others feel bad and start a flame war so please do NOT.
body_tagged: So I don't know if I'm happy or sad or interested the I have ADHD we just found out a few days ago that I have it and I'm curious to see how many people have it here (Only tell me/us if you are okay with it) and tell me your experiences and privileges you get because I know some people get extra things if they have the disorder. (Mine are getting discussed I believe). So yeah only tell us if you want to and yeah bye. This post is not meant to be a personal post or make others feel bad and start a flame war so please do NOT.
title: ADHD I have it.

replies.body: Yes. One of my parents friends daughter has it and she gets extra time on her exam's because its harder for her to concentrate.
replies.body_tagged: Yes. One of my parents friends daughter has it and she gets extra time on her exam's because its harder for her to concentrate.

replies.body:
Attention deficit hyperactive disorder. Good luck with it, my aunt apparently has it, according to my mom, and she told me all kinds of storys.

Good luck, and may the odds be ever in your favor =o

Btw, you seem to be handling it pretty well <3

replies.body:
I have adhd, but i don't get extra because i am top of my year. If i wanted to get extra time i could but i just don't like the idea of that.

My subjects average range between 92-96%. However it use to be a lot worse until i started taking medication. Now if you talked to me you wouldn't be able to guess i have it.
